channel.title: Africa on Joseph C
channel.description: Recent content in Africa on Joseph C

item.title: “Hell on earth”: satellite images document the siege of a Sudanese city
item.description: Built the graphics for this piece showing the war-related fires in Darfur as well as the destruction in el-Fasher and neighbouring villages and camps. Part of a series of articles and films from The Economist about the disaster taking place in Sudan.
